ai_insights.full_response:
1. PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: These black pants and t-shirt combo exude a sleek and modern aesthetic. The pants feature a comfortable fit and versatile style, while the t-shirt adds a casual yet chic touch to the outfit. Perfect for a day out or a casual evening gathering.

2. OUTFIT_SUGGESTION: Pair these black pants with a crisp white button-down shirt and a pair of loafers for a smart casual look. For a more laid-back vibe, style the t-shirt with high-waisted jeans and sneakers. Add a statement belt or accessories to elevate the outfit.

3. SOCIAL_CAPTION: "Elevate your casual style with this black pants and t-shirt combo! Versatile and chic, perfect for any occasion. #FashionForward #CasualChic #BlackOutfit"
